text:
Dr. Harry Skornia
August 23, 1957
- 2 -
I hope this reply may be of some help in planning the research
seminar for December.
Sincerely yours.
Bemarr Cooper, Director
University TV and Radio
BC
P.S. Sorry about the lateness of the report on the workshop.
Getting an FCC application finalised, helping plan the temporary
studio site and specifications for bids on studio and transmitter
equipment, directing a one-hour teaching demonstration film on
radiation biology and teaching a one-week workshop for IV moniÂ¬
tor- teachere are partly responsible.
